ARABIC: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the earth and the mountains are lifted and crushed with a single blow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the earth and mountains heaved and crushed to powder with one levelling blow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the earth and the mountains are carried aloft and are crushed to bits at one stroke,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: the earth and mountains will be raised up high and crushed all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the earth and the mountains will be lifted up and crushed with a single crush.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the earth and the mountains shall be removed from their places, and crushed with a single crushing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the earth and the mountains are borne away and crushed with a single crushing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the earth and the mountains are lifted up and crushed with a single blow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the earth with the mountains shall be lifted up and crushed with one crash,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the earth and the mountains are lifted up and then crushed with a single blow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the earth and the mountains shall be borne and the twain shall be crushed with a single crash.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the earth and the mountains are lifted and levelled with a single levelling,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the earth is moved, and its mountains, and they are crushed to powder at one stroke,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the earth and the mountains shall be removed from their places, and crushed with a single crushing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: when the earth with all its mountains is lifted up and crushed with a single blow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the earth and the mountains are lifted up, and crushed, with a single crush.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:14] and the earth and the mountains are lifted and levelled with a single levelling,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the earth with the mountains) it is said: what is on the earth of buildings and the mountains (shall be lifted up and crushed with one crash,
